resources.string: Let’s learn about some history now.
You will need to reach the “end” of the path.
You can observe the flowing water on the way.
Bulwary Mieleckie is a 1.5 kilometer path made to allows for easy access for the South end of Mielec while still presenting the beautiful scenery near it.
Park Oborskich is a park containing a playground, fountain, and museum made to honor the history of the Mielecki region.
2. Read the clue. If you need more help. Hit the "Hint" button.
3. Once at the location that the hint takes you to. Hit the "Found It!" button.
4. Repeat these steps until you are at the final destination.
You\'re not in the right location! Move to the correct location and try again.
